text:
I was following the dso install document word for word and ran into a really 
stupid issue.. it says to do 'configure' and then 'make install'..... i was 
following that and not getting dso compiled in... 
duh.. 'configure', 'make', 'make install' and everything was where i needed it 
to be
creator: scottk@uclick.com

text:
I'm fairly sure that "make install" is equivalent to "make; make install".
Could you please try again with a later version of apache and let us
know if it doesn't work.

In any case, that *should* work, so if it doesn't this is a build bug,
not a doc bug.
creator: slive@apache.org
